alert.note: Alert for Eastern Addison; Eastern Chittenden; Washington; Western Chittenden (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 26 at 4:05PM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...Heavy snow will impact portions of east central Essex, northwestern Addison, southern Chittenden and southwestern Washington Counties through 445 PM EST... At 405 PM EST, heavy snow was reported over Hinesburg, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Visibility less than a mile. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Low visibility may pose a hazard to motorists. Locations impacted include... Montpelier, South Burlington, Essex, Willsboro, Monkton Ridge, Waterbury Village, Monkton, Monkton Boro, Middlesex, Hinesburg, St. George, Moretown, Starksboro, Shelburne, Ferrisburg, Charlotte, Waitsfield, Fayston, Richmond and Mt. Philo State Park. This includes the following highways... Interstate 87 between mile markers 121 and 125. Interstate 89 between mile markers 53 and 73.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Addison; Eastern Chittenden; Washington; Western Chittenden
